Name: Mexican Mule
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Copper mug or Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lime slice wheel and mint sprigs.
POUR first 3 ingredients into mug/glass and briefly stir.
Two-thirds fill glass with cubed ice.
TOP with ginger beer and briefly stir.
Fill glass with a crown of crushed ice.
Garnish with lime slice and mint sprigs bouquet.
Review: As the name suggests, this is a tequila-based version of the Moscow Mule - simple as that. And very tasty.
Nutrition: One serving of Mexican Mule contains 220 calories
